title: Disco type
content:
I’ve seen this type many times, usually related to disco. In fact I think it’s the same type on the famous ’Disco Sucks’ banner. What’s the name?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [asdf.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629040023/http:/typophile.com/files/asdf_0.jpg) | 26.77 KB |
author: Hughes

comments.content:
It does seems like Shatter was used, but something else was done (maybe overlaying) so that most of the normally blank spaces in Shatter are filled.

- Mike Yanega
